data: Beautiful glass morphism card component with multiple variants and customization options.
data.default#Default:
Default Glass Card
Beautiful frosted glass effect
This card uses the default glass morphism style with subtle backdrop blur.
data.tinted#Tinted:
Tinted Glass Card
Gradient-tinted glass effect
This variant adds a beautiful gradient tint to the glass effect.
data.with-hover-effect#With Hover Effect:
Interactive Card
Hover to see the lift effect
This card lifts up when you hover over it with enhanced shadow.
data.props#Props: Prop	Type	Default	Description	variant	'default' | 'frosted' | 'tinted' | 'translucent'	'default'	Glass style variant	padding	'none' | 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl'	'md'	Internal padding	rounded	'none' | 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl' | 'full'	'lg'	Border radius	shadow	'none' | 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl'	'md'	Shadow size	hover	'none' | 'lift' | 'glow' | 'scale'	'none'	Hover animation
data.subcomponents#Subcomponents:
GlassCardHeader - Header section
GlassCardTitle - Title with gradient text
GlassCardDescription - Subtitle text
GlassCardContent - Main content area
GlassCardFooter - Footer section
data.accessibility#Accessibility:
Proper semantic HTML structure
Keyboard navigation support
Screen reader friendly
WCAG 2.1 AA compliant

data: Beautiful button component with gradient backgrounds and multiple variants.
data.variants#Variants:
Purple
Orange
Blue
Green
Outline
Ghost
data.props#Props: Prop	Type	Default	Description	variant	'purple' | 'orange' | 'blue' | 'green' | 'outline' | 'ghost'	'purple'	Button style variant	size	'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl' | 'icon'	'md'	Button size	animation	'none' | 'pulse' | 'bounce' | 'glow'	'none'	Animation effect	disabled	boolean	false	Disable button
data.accessibility#Accessibility:
Proper button semantics
Focus visible states
Keyboard accessible
Disabled state handling
WCAG 2.1 AA compliant

data: Beautiful glass morphism component library for ReactRANA UI is a collection of beautifully designed React components with glass morphism effects, gradients, and modern aesthetics built with Tailwind CSS. Part of the RANA (Rapid AI Native Architecture) ecosystem.
data.features#Features:
‚ú® Glass Morphism - Beautiful frosted glass effects
üé® Gradients - Vibrant gradient backgrounds
üéØ Variants - Multiple styles for every component
‚ôø Accessible - WCAG 2.1 AA compliant
üé≠ Dark Mode - Full dark mode support
‚ö° Fast - Optimized for performance
üì¶ Tree-shakeable - Only import what you need
üõ†Ô∏è CLI Tool - Easy component installation
üìè Design System - Consistent patterns across your app
data.installation#Installation:
npm install @rana/ui class-variance-authority clsx tailwind-merge
Or use the CLI:
npx @rana/ui-cli init
npx @rana/ui-cli add glass-card
data.available-components#Available Component:
Glass Card - Frosted glass card with multiple variants (clear, tinted, vibrant)
Gradient Button - Button with gradient backgrounds (purple, blue, green, orange)
Icon Circle - Circular icon container with glass effect
Feature Badge - Badge for highlighting features
Clean Mode Card - Minimal card component for clean layouts
All components support:
TypeScript with full type definitions
Tailwind CSS utility classes
Dark mode out of the box
CVA (Class Variance Authority) for variants
Customizable via props
data.cli-commands#CLI Commands: RANA UI comes with a powerful CLI for managing components:
data.initialize-project#Initialize Project:
rana-ui init
Sets up RANA UI configuration, creates component directories, and checks dependencies.
data.add-components#Add Components:
# Add specific components
rana-ui add glass-card gradient-button
# Interactive selection
rana-ui add
# Add all components
rana-ui add --all
# Overwrite existing files
rana-ui add glass-card --overwrite
data.list-components#List Components:
rana-ui list
Shows all available components with descriptions.
data.rana-framework#RANA Framework:
RANA UI is part of the larger RANA ecosystem which includes:
Quality Gates - Ensure production-quality code at every phase
REPM Validation - Strategic validation for major features
CLI Tools - 9+ commands for project management and validation
MCP Server - Claude Code integration with 6 tools and guided prompts
Design System Checker - Automated compliance checking
TypeScript SDK - Programmatic access to all features
Learn more at github.com/waymaker-ai/ranavibe
